name: Wild Boss
description:
Walter the Raccon doesn't have the nicest job in the world.

Somedays are so bad he might as well just die. 

And Boss's somewhat difficult personality doesn't make it any better.

Help Walter make the best decisions to achieve some sort of happiness in his office life. 

Creators:
Andrezza Almeida
Matheus Pires
Mariana Bede
Rodrigo Will
Victoria Périco
